summary: Syntax highlighting for monkeyd http server configuration files
name: monkeyd-configuration-syntax
description: Syntax highlighting for monkeyd http server configuration files
install_details:
Place in ~/.vimrc/syntax/.
You may wish to create a ~/.vim/ftdetect/monkey.vim file containing something like:
    au BufNewFile,BufRead /*/etc/monkeyd/* set filetype=monkeyd
